tool_description: An API that takes an Excel formula and returns a brief explanation of its use case.
name: Excel Formulas API
title: Excel Formulas API

api_list.name: Excel Formula Explanation Endpoint
api_list.description: Returns a brief explanation of the excel formula queried.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://excel-formulas-api.p.rapidapi.com/excel/formula"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "excel-formulas-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://excel-formulas-api.p.rapidapi.com/excel/formula"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "excel-formulas-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
